mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, GENDER, INGIDO, MEM_POINT, EMAIL, NICKNAME, MEM_NAME, MEM_AREA, PHONE, TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "BIRTHDAY", DETAIL_AREA, MEM_STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, GRADE, END_DATE, T.TEAM_NO, TEAM_NAME, TEAM_GRADE, BADGE_CHANGE_NAME, FAILCNT FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN PENALTY USING (MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN TEAM_MEMBER T USING (MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN TEAM USING USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, GENDER, INGIDO, MEM_POINT, EMAIL, NICKNAME, MEM_NAME, MEM_AREA, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, DETAIL_AREA, MEM_STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, GRADE, FAILCNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{gender}, #{ingido}, #{memPoint}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{memName}, #{memArea}, #{phone}, #{birthDay}, #{detailArea}, 'Y', SYSDATE, #{grade}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET FAILCNT = FAILCNT + 1 WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET FAILCNT = 0 WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = #{memPwd} WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = #{memName} AND PHONE = #{phone}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CERT ( CERT_IP, SECRET_NO, VALID_TIME ) VALUES ( #{certIp}, #{secretNo}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT CERT_IP, SECRET_NO, VALID_TIME FROM CERT WHERE CERT_IP = #{certIp} AND SECRET_NO = #{secretNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = #{memPwd}, FAILCNT = 0 WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_NO = #{memNo}
